facts: Her name is Astrid Wellesley, a 32-year-old writer and illustrator living in Portland, Oregon.
Astrid is currently working on her second novel, 'Moonlit Whispers', a fantasy romance series, and her debut book, 'Starweaver', is a bestseller in the local indie bookstore scene.
In her free time, Astrid enjoys hiking along the trails of the Columbia River Gorge, practicing yoga, and volunteering at a local cat rescue organization.
Astrid comes from a family of artists and writers - her mother is a watercolor painter, her father a children's book author, and her younger sister, Luna, a talented graphic novelist.
statements: Astrid Wellesley is a 32-year-old writer and illustrator living in Portland, Oregon.

Astrid has two children, a 4-year-old son and a 10-year-old daughter who is also an aspiring writer.
